Sentencas: Perovskite-type materials have been investigated extensively in the attempt to discover new electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) operating at low temperatures.
Titulo: The Effect of Pr co-doping on the Densification and Electrical Properties of Sr-LaAlO3

Sentencas: These materials include LaAlO3-based perovskite, which, when adequately doped, presents high ionic conductivity.
Titulo: The Effect of Pr co-doping on the Densification and Electrical Properties of Sr-LaAlO3

Sentencas: However, despite the high conductivity of doped LaAlO3, two characteristics limit its application as solid electrolyte: low sinterability and p-type electronic conductivity in oxidizing conditions.
Titulo: The Effect of Pr co-doping on the Densification and Electrical Properties of Sr-LaAlO3

Sentencas: The purpose of this work was to investigate the effect of Pr co-doping on the densification and electrical conductivity of Sr-doped LaAlO3.
Titulo: The Effect of Pr co-doping on the Densification and Electrical Properties of Sr-LaAlO3

Sentencas: The addition of Pr eliminated the deficiencies mentioned above.
Titulo: The Effect of Pr co-doping on the Densification and Electrical Properties of Sr-LaAlO3

Sentencas: Pr in solid solution acts as a perfect sintering aid because promoted densification without forming secondary phase which should be detrimental for electrical conduction.
Titulo: The Effect of Pr co-doping on the Densification and Electrical Properties of Sr-LaAlO3

Sentencas: The addition of Pr also increased the bulk electrical conductivity measured in air atmosphere but had no effect at low oxygen partial pressure.
Titulo: The Effect of Pr co-doping on the Densification and Electrical Properties of Sr-LaAlO3

Sentencas: However, the addition of Pr had a strong effect on the grain boundary, improving the ionic grain boundary electrical conductivity at air atmosphere which was attributed to the Pr influence on the space charge layer.
Titulo: The Effect of Pr co-doping on the Densification and Electrical Properties of Sr-LaAlO3
